translation.ko: 그런 오염 물질로 인한 해가 영양 섭취의 득보다 클 때도 많죠

translation.en: A common belief is that fish are the best source
translation.ko: 흔히 생선에 오메가3지방산이 가장 풍부하게 있다고 하죠

translation.en: of these essential omega-3 fatty acids,
translation.ko: 흔히 생선에 오메가3지방산이 가장 풍부하게 있다고 하죠 "마이클 클래퍼 의학 박사 내과의, 트루노스 클리닉"

translation.en: but people don't realize that fish don't make omega-3 fatty acids.
translation.ko: 하지만 생선은 오메가3지방산을 만들지 않는단 건 몰라요

translation.en: and the fish swallow the algae cells.
translation.ko: 생선은 그 조류 세포를 삼키는 거고요

translation.ko: 그래서 조류의 DHA가 생선 살에 들어가게 되는데

translation.en: that when we kill the fish, and crush its flesh,
translation.ko: 우리는 생선을 죽이고 그 살을 으스러뜨려

translation.en: and squeeze out the "fish oil" for the omega-3s,
it was really algae oil in there all the time.
translation.ko: 그 안에 든 건 언제나 해조유였어요

translation.en: So why not just eat the algae that has those great benefits we're looking for?
translation.ko: 그 좋은 점들을 가진 해조류를 직접 먹는 게 어떨까요? "도미니크 반스 뉴 웨이브 푸즈 설립자"

translation.en: Why even mess with the middleman,
and just eat the direct source.
We started New Wave Foods with the mission to disrupt seafood,
not oceans, by creating seafood from sea plants.
translation.ko: 바다를 해치지 않고 해산물을 공급한다는 사명으로 시작했어요

translation.en: So you're not gonna miss out on taste, it's there for you. It's delicious.
translation.ko: 맛도 놓치지 않고요 그대로 느껴질 거예요

translation.ko: 맛있어요 근데 콜레스테롤은 없죠 PCB도 없고

translation.en: no mercury, no heavy antibiotics.
You get the things you want from seafood, but none of the negative things.
translation.ko: 해산물에서 기대하는 모든 걸 얻죠 부정적인 건 빼고요

translation.en: Plant-based solutions, I think,
is definitely one of the best options that we have to go forward.
translation.ko: 우리가 연구해야 할 최선의 선택지 중 하나라고 봅니다

translation.en: Traditional animal agriculture, raising cows and chickens on land,
translation.ko: 소와 닭을 키우는 등 전통적인 축산은 바다에 큰 영향을 미쳐요

translation.en: have huge impacts in the ocean.
translation.ko: 전통적인 축산은 바다에 큰 영향을 미쳐요

translation.en: The runoff from those procedures create dead zones in the environment.
translation.ko: 그 과정에서 나온 유출 액체는 산소 없는 죽음의 바다를 만들죠

translation.en: And fishing and fish farming, too. So if we can find alternatives
translation.ko: 어업과 양식업도요 똑같이 맛있고 몸에 좋으면서

translation.en: that are just as delicious, just as healthy for you,
but better for the environment, why wouldn't we do it?
[Ali] My journey had taken me far.
And despite witnessing catastrophic destruction,
I had more admiration for the ocean than ever before.
translation.ko: 그 어느 때보다 바다에 감탄하게 됐죠

translation.en: I felt empowered by what I'd learned,
and couldn't wait to put it into practice.
Although I still pick up trash on beaches,
and have embarked on a project to continue investigating
translation.ko: 환경 문제에 대해 조사와 보도를 이어갈

translation.en: and reporting on environmental issues,
with so many plant-based alternatives
emerging for almost every seafood product I could imagine…
I realized the single best thing I could do every single day
translation.ko: 제가 사랑하는 바다와 해양 야생 동물을 보호하기 위해

translation.en: to protect the ocean and the marine life I loved,
translation.ko: 매일 실천할 수 있는 한 가지 최선의 방법은

translation.en: was to simply...
not eat them.
[Roberts] If we protect more and fish less,
translation.ko: 우리가 더 많이 보호하고 물고기를 덜 잡고

translation.en: and restore that kind of balance and healthy ecosystem,
they've got a good chance of making it through the tough times ahead.
translation.ko: 바다 생물도 힘든 시간을 잘 헤쳐나갈 수 있을 겁니다

translation.en: There is real hope here
because marine ecosystems bounce back so quickly
translation.ko: 해양 생태계는 여건만 된다면 굉장히 빨리 회복하니까요

translation.en: if they're allowed to.
You would see the reefs coming back,
you would see these incredible shoals of fish returning,
translation.ko: 그 멋진 물고기 떼들이 돌아올 것이고

translation.en: you would see the whales returning to our coast.
This is within our grasp.
We can do this.

for rewilding, are incredibly exciting,
but it can only happen if very large areas of sea
are closed to commercial fishing.
And while governments are not prepared to take action,
translation.ko: 그리고 정부가 아직 조치를 취하지 않는 동안

translation.en: and while the industry is basically unregulated,
the only ethical thing to do
translation.ko: 할 수 있는 유일한 윤리적인 일은

translation.en: is to stop eating fish.
It isn't too late to take the best hope we will ever have
translation.ko: 이 우주에서 집을 갖는다는 최고의 희망을 품기에

To respect what we've got, to protect what remains,

Most of the positive and negative things
that bring about change in human civilization
start with someone.
Some "one."

translation.ko: 그리고 어느 하나가 모든 걸 할 순 없어요

big ideas make a big difference.
That's what we can do.
